'''Hugo Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Hugo was the son of [[Otto Boffin]] and [[Lavender Grubb]]. He married [[Donnamira Took]] and had two children, [[Jago Boffin|Jago]] and [[Jessamine Boffin|Jessamine]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
